A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed the Last Jedi. It's easily one the best\, if not the best\, Star Wars films. Firstly\, the characters are great and they all go on interesting journeys throughout the film. Secondly\, the story actually focuses on the characters instead of surprises and has an interesting message about the force being for everyone not just a few select dynasties. Lastly\, the humour was great which seems to have upset some people.
